name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JhonnyM by Arkanath - Productive New Tab Page

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An awesome productivity tool that works as your new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
New in v3:

1. Elegant, Minimalistic, and Clean New Interface.
2. New Night Theme
--------------------------------------------------------
Meet JhonnyM, your new dumb assistant.
--------------------------------------------------------
All your productivity needs right at your new tab.

Features:
1. All productive tools in a single page.
2. Account your time and view categorised statistics.
3. Create your own categories.
4. Use great features like Calendar, Calculator, Wikipedia , Youtube and more in one go.
5. Runs offline, using local storage.
6. Days defined by your sleep cycle.
7. Multiple User Support.
8. Cool native apps like calendar, calculator, etc.
9. In active development, much more yet to come!

Report bugs in reviews and they will soon be fixed.
